document.full_text: a proposal by a group of canadian banks and pension funds to take over the operator of the toronto stock exchange offers cost savings and opportunities for international growth, the group said on monday.
document.title: new tmx takeover proposal eyes foreign expansion
lines_and_colors: a proposal by a group of canadian banks and pension funds to take over the operator of the toronto stock exchange offers cost savings and opportunities for international growth, the group said on monday.
